originalText.text: Victoria photographed our wedding on 10/8/22 and we could not be more pleased with our experience. Communication was easy leading up to the wedding. Her prices are excellent and we received sneak peak photos within a day or two with the rest of our photos arriving just a short time after! We highly recommended Victoria and Harlem House Photography!

text.text: Victoria photographed our wedding on 10/8/22 and we could not be more pleased with our experience. Communication was easy leading up to the wedding. Her prices are excellent and we received sneak peak photos within a day or two with the rest of our photos arriving just a short time after! We highly recommended Victoria and Harlem House Photography!

originalText.text: Victoria was our wedding photographer on September 21, 2018. She was absolutely amazing. So kind and easy going. She made us feel so comfortable. She worked with our budget and our pictures came out amazing! I couldn't recommend her more. Even one of my best friends who was a bridesmaid at my wedding used her for her wedding day!

text.text: Victoria was our wedding photographer on September 21, 2018. She was absolutely amazing. So kind and easy going. She made us feel so comfortable. She worked with our budget and our pictures came out amazing! I couldn't recommend her more. Even one of my best friends who was a bridesmaid at my wedding used her for her wedding day!

originalText.text: Victoria at Harlem House Photography did my engagement photos and they came out perfect! She was fun and also the epitome of professional. She put us in great poses, but also caught those natural and emotional moments when we were spontaneous and ourselves between poses. Hire her!!! You’ll be so glad you did!!

text.text: Victoria at Harlem House Photography did my engagement photos and they came out perfect! She was fun and also the epitome of professional. She put us in great poses, but also caught those natural and emotional moments when we were spontaneous and ourselves between poses. Hire her!!! You’ll be so glad you did!!

originalText.text: Pictures are one of the most important parts of of a wedding so you can look back and remember the amazing day you had. Me and my husband were extremely lucky to have been able to work with Victoria Lodi and Dan Leong for our September 2019 wedding. The second we met Victoria we felt completely at ease, we knew we could count on her and not have to worry about anything. After having our venue cancel on us last minute, along with our caterers and florist deciding they did not want to travel to the new venue- literally nothing was going right. During all of this Victoria never once made us worry, she was more than happy to be flexible and work around our situation. Weddings are stressful and expensive, but Victoria did everything she could to make our wedding day the best day and her work was absolutely worth every penny. I could not have been happier. Thank you for everything you did for us Victoria. I would and will be recommending her to everyone and anyone.

originalText.text: We commissioned Victoria to do a family location shoot. Not only did she conduct herself with the utmost professionalism, she was fantastic with our children. Her patience is admirable, her technique was impressive, and the photos came out beautiful. What I appreciate most is Victoria’s diverse style. She is truly a gifted photographer who clearly loves what she does.
